title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Friends
description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six 20 to 30-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

title: Todo mundo odeia o Chris
description: A young African American teen attempts to survive with his dysfunctional family and his all white school in the 1980s.

title: Two and a Half Man
description: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

title: The Simpsons
description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

title: Family Guy
description: A young African American teen attempts to survive with his dysfunctional family and his all white school in the 1980s.

title: The Walking Dead
description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins, and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
description: An elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts work their cases in Las Vegas.

title: The Fresh Prince
description: A streetwise, poor young man from Philadelphia is sent by his mother to live with his aunt, uncle and cousins in their Bel-Air mansion.
